author: ate
msg: Backporting some more example (commented out) distributed cache configuration settings from 2.2 trunk I missed in the previous commit.

author: ddas
msg: Merge -r 746232:746233 from trunk onto branch-0.20. Fixes HADOOP-5247.

author: ddas
msg: HADOOP-5247. Introduces a broadcast of KillJobAction to all trackers when a job finishes. This fixes a bunch of problems to do with NPE when a completed job is not in memory and a tasktracker comes to the jobtracker with a status report of a task belonging to that job. Contributed by Amar Kamat.

author: gnodet
msg: SMX4NMR-99, SMX4NMR-100 + big refactoring of the deployer
